name: Soul Delivery Service
description:
You're a soul delivery person on their first day at the job in the Underworld. The problem? It's laden with traps, and these souls absolutely hate you! You must wrangle as many souls into their designated urns as possible within the time limit, dodging their attacks and not letting them pull you into traps! Think of it like walking a dog! ...A very, very angry dog.

Main programming, music, sound and writing by Iodine

Art and programming by Spotted_Leaf

(The soul box is in the boat, follow the blue arrow! play the tutorial, it's very short!)
